email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel I have in mind is the MV Oceanic Voyager, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. Laycan is 15-20 October. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider $50.75? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for the 15-20 October window? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the rate to $51.25 per metric ton. The MV Oceanic Voyager is confirmed available for the 15-20 October laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the draft charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the draft charter party agreement by end of day today. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ll review the charter party agreement once received. Let’s aim to finalize by tomorrow. Cheers, John
